Blog.post: Twas a kinda boring day today...but I got one of those sig thing everyone else has! looky: Meh, PE tommrow :(

Just sepent half the day downloading a new version of AOL :-/ why does it have to be so big? There is one good thing though, it comes with a sperate dialer so I don't have to open AOL to connect anymore, I just need to use that dialer...so no more resourse eating AOL running, yay!
Well...this is my first post in my new blog site, and I guess it should be a welcome! Welcome to my life ;D
My second update of the day (I'm making it up you see ;)) I decided to put google ads in here. (i'm cheeky arent I? :D)

Not updated in a while...maybe it's because nobody reads it? :P ah well, all's well, I got a domain about a month ago, and I reformatted about 3 weeks ago and I still have loads to install (stupid dialup connection!) meh :(

I've got Gmail ^_^ (thanks urlLink Gary ) I've been playing around with it for quite a while (been playing tropico when I wasn't :P), I got my google check the day before yesterday (forgot to tell you all...well...the one person who reads this). Will go down to the bank mon/tues to cash it, then i'll be able to buy YPP ^_^ it's been a good week this week as you can tell...Thats all I think. btw, my gmail email addy is: adrianh [at] gmail dot com incase anyone wanted to know :P

Just spent a few hours playing tropico (not played it in ages) and I forgot how addictive it is, I had to force myself away from it...if you don't know what it is, your a president of an island and you have to build things to make money ect. make alliances with countries, and keep your people happy, I always get stuck on this sinario where you keep getting attacked by rebels, I can never manage to hire enough solders to keep them away. =\

Not posted in a while, thats because i'm coding my own forum, urlLink looky! which is going well...I put a urlLink shoutbox up, thanks urlLink Saybox . We had a power cut today which was really boring >. :O Thats it really...

Meh, I hate monday, not only is it the first day back at school, it's the day with the worst lessons -_-, Ah well only a 3 day week this week (thursday and friday are inset days) and Monday is a bank holiday ^_^. So that like a 5 day weekend. :P
I added a forum, cause no site is complete without one :D, urlLink Click Here!
My mum just gave me Â£20 ($35.55) for nowt ^_^, well there probably was a reason behind it somwhere but I can't find it...Now I need to decide what to spend it on...
Wooo...the weekend :D Not much happened over the last few days...been a boring week overall, hopefully i'll have something to write tommorow :P

A second update can't hurt, can it? I just wanted to show you this: Cattell's 16 Factor Test Results Warmth ||||||||| 26% Intellect |||||||||||||||||| 54% Emotional Stability ||||||||||||||| 50% Aggressiveness |||||||||||| 38% Liveliness ||||||||||||||| 46% Dutifulness |||||||||||||||||| 54% Social Assertiveness ||||||||||||||||||||| 70% Sensitivity ||||||||| 26% Paranoia ||||||||||||||| 42% Abstractness |||||||||||||||||| 54% Introversion ||||||||||||||||||||| 62% Anxiety ||||||||||||||||||||| 62% Openmindedness ||||||||| 26% Independence ||||||||| 30% Perfectionism |||||||||||| 38% Tension ||||||||| 26%

I just searched on google for XMBHost (my main website), and the stupid thing has put my blog over it, I can't see my website now...I think it might be because googles on the crawl and I posted a link to here that was on a forum being crawled (it was an invision board so I could watch it :D) so it's indexed this site, before it's got to my other one again... -_- I hope it goes back to normal soon.

I might be getting bb (Broadband) soon! My mum said she'd talk to my dad about it, which means she'll force my dad to get it me, so expect me to be going around at superspeed soon :P :D Maths was even stranger than it usually is today, I think my teacher finally lost the last few cells of her brain, she spent the whole lesson going around taking the mick out of random people O.o PE was ok today, I did athletics, 200 meter's sprint ect., I thought I did pretty well... I did a few small changes to the blog today to reflect one or two of the new features blogger has released, If you click on a title, it will take you to a page with only that post on, and if you click on my name which is just under the post, it will take you to my blogger profile. I think that's it for now, if not, I'll just post another message later :P ;) :D Bye I think this is the longest message I've ever posted in my blog :D

Just thought i'd share this with you all: What happens when you try to be Japanese? by urlLink hideto Your Name Your Age Your Japanese Name Umi (Sea) Your New Style Gothic Lolita Your Favourite Singer Kozi You end up becoming.. An international film star Cash flow? $229,819,897 You die.. From an STD. Created with the ORIGINAL urlLink MemeGen ! -_- :D

Hehe, I have lots of new features on my blog to play with ^_^ blogger has done a big update, have a look at the homepage: urlLink here , tis sexy. Still not seen all the new things yet tho...Built in comments is one thing, but I'm not too impressed with that, sucky, so I'm staying with haloscan :) Well, see you later, i'm off to go and look at the new things. :D
Finally, it's the weekend, this week really dragged for some reason, I think it's because it's half term holidays in the next 2 weeks, but it's really annoying, ah well, lie in tommorow ^_^.
I got a new template for my blog, I think it looks cool ^_^

I finally bought ypp, for those of you who don't know what that is, it's a game that I like, kinds expensive though...buy yeah, i've been spending a lot of time playing that...I need to save up for a new sword, the one I have now is rubbish (i'm talking about the game for all of you who are confused). If you want to look, the site is urlLink here , you get 10 free logins then you have to pay :), but it's worth it... Well, i'm off to go play ypp again, bye :) Oh, yeah, I decided to remove the ads, there was no clicks on them anyway...They just got in the way...and they werent needed.
Did I mention I use urlLink Elixant as my host? :P

I'm on holiday for a week ^_^ yes, thats 7 days full of sleep, eating, posting here and going on voyages with rene in ypp (I got told off for not mentioning last time I spoke about it). Then i'm back at school for 6 weeks, then it's the summer holiday ^_^, and thats the end of high school...but I'm going to go to college ofcourse :P. I might even manage to post every day this week aswell....aslong as there something to post about...hmm...not very likely then. well, that it, bye :P
What do you think of the patters at the side of My Life (the blog name)? :D

I like wednesdays, mainly because school finishes at 2:00 PM, and at that time, the bus what comes right out side my house arrives at the right time, at 3:15 you usually have to wait 30 mins or something...anyway, I took this weired finding nemo test, aparantly I am dory... urlLink What Finding Nemo Character are You? brought to you by urlLink Quizilla Lol, anyway, thats it, bye :)

It was sunny today ^_^ so I took the oportunity t go and get a suntan...and I have one...from just one day of sunbathing O.O, anyway, apart from sunbathing, I played swingball, chased my dog who nicked my sandals, played a bit more swingball, chased my dog some more, and then I came and collapsed on my couch...very eventfull day, eh? And for the record, I havent found my sandal, it'll probably turn up half chewed in my dogs bed tommorow, the little bugger. I think thats it atm, if not, tough. Bye.

I guess I don't have time to update it every day in the holiday then, huh? Anyway, I went into town yesterday, bought Roller coaster tycoon 2 and the roller coaster tycoon 2 time twister addon from GAME...It's addictive =D I just finshed updating a mozilla update... I think thats it...bye

Were ordering broadband this week...wooo ^_^ Euro 2004 starts today aswell :D can't wait for tomorrow, so we can kill France...Cause they're rubbish...They only have one good player, Henry. Anyway, I put the saybox on the right hand side of the blog...Might get a bit more noticed now. that's it for today...Bye.
All the invites are gone, if your email addy didn't work when one was sent, tough, it went to somone else. Thats what you get for wasting my time. :P
5 gmail invites up for grabs...you should know what to do by now :P leave your first name, last name and your rmail address in a comment on this post.
No more invites for today...they've been coming alot this week though, so watch out for more :P

Well, I have 4 invites up for grabs (5 were avalible but i'm giving one to somone who I choose), you know the drill, first 4 ppl to comment with their first name, last name and email address will get an invite :). Along with that, blogger has just gave me another gmail account...maybe I should start a collection of them...kinda like a stamp collection...without the stamps...
I made a new website for my blog :) urlLink looky! , I also changed the blog colors to match...
All the invites have gone...hopefully there will be more soon :P
I have 2 invites up for grabs, so the first two people to comment on this post with their first name, last name and their email address will get an invite. I'll post again when they have gone.
I decided to add haloscans trackback thing...doubt anyone would use it though.
Ah, bastard...We lost...we had the game up untill the last 5 mins...*sigh*
urlLink Shutdown the Internet Hehe, just thought i'd show you something i've found
I fixed the issues with PHPSuExec (with a little help from urlLink Mike O , thanks mike!)...but i still hate it ;)
I hate PHPSuExec

And I make that...3 weeks till the holidays, woot :D Put your hands up if you watched england v. portugal last night...*puts hand up*...and who was gutted afterwards...*puts hand up*...and who thinks there was something dodgy about that ref? *puts hand up* That was a perfectly good goal >:O if we'd have got that goal, we'd still be in, and i'd be in a good mood right now >:O the ref either took bribes or was annoyed about us winning his county 3-0...and UEFA claims these are the best refs in europe...har bloody har har har. This is something that did make me laugh on the radio today though, aparantly, he has a website about him being a ref ect., but it had to be shut down today because it receved over 20,000 hits in one minute from england fans getting his email address (yes, it was on there), so thats cheered me up a teeny bit...and i have his email addy to :D but he prolly deleted it now :( bye. - Adrian

Boring day today...*yawn* But I got 1 hour and 30 mins dinner today, because my science teacher had to go somwhere at the last minute...so there were no supply teachers... And for those of you who are confused about why it extended my dinner, here's a look at how my schools dinners work; There are 3 half hour sections, 2 of then are used for lessons, 1 used for dinner. It means dinners are at different times every day...well...different times during period 4...4.1, 4.2 and 4.3... Your all probably confused at that...so i'll go now :P

Why do us in the UK get such shorter holidays than the us? does the government think we can work more or something? -_- I have 4 bloody weeks untill the holidays...and i'm tired as hell... thats my ant over with...bye.
Weee...only 2 weeks to go untill i'm off school :P umm...thats all i wanted to say really..bye :P

I got a new plasma lamp today...my old one broke years ago...i'd forgot how fun they are :P if you don't know what i'm talking about, it's like one of those orbs where those line of static electricity come out of the core thing...i think it's static electricity anyway...wooo...
I got a domain for my blog...so tommorow you'll be able to access this site via http://adrianhardy.com ^_^ http://mylife.xmbhost.com will just redirect to adrianhardy.com :)

I moved XMB Host to a new server today...well Mike O did...and it's not in the burst datacenter, yaaaaaaaay!!!! anyway, specs: Intel Pentium 4 2.8GHz w/HT Â» 1 GB DDR RAM Â» 120 GB IDE HD Â» 1500 GB/MONTH Â» 100 MBPS Port Â» 8 IP's Â» Fantastico/Xcontroller Â» CPSkins/SimSkins/RedTrix/BlueTrix skins Â» Cpanel/WHM and it's in the planet datacenter, in texas...one of the best datacenters in the world. weeee... anyway, i'm gonna go and play with WHM, bye :)

Maybe it's because nothing has happened? yeah...thats it :P Anyway...i'm going on holiday in a week ^_^ then when we come back were ordering broadband...yaaay! When i get it i'm gonna dl linux, because i can use all my favorite things on there...so i'll have a better os, and all my favorite things on it :D woo...i'm glad that pipex give you one of the only usb broadband modems that support linux whew...and ypp is coded in java, so it works on linux ^_^ I hope nothing goes wrong when i partition my hd >. urlLink Screen shots of fedore core 2 Well, thats it. Bye :)

3 days till i set off for my holiday ^_^ were not going abroad this year though, i dunno who :( it's been quite a boring year this one :-\ anyway...were going to devon for 2 weeks...were staying in a relatives house. I'm not looking forward to the 4-5 hour car drive though :( i'd much rather spend 2 hours on a plane to spain...but ah well. The next post i'll make will probably be when i'm back, unless i can get on the computer to make a post just beofre we set off... Anyway, bye :)
